name: GrindstoneEvent.OnTakeItem
description: This event is Cancelable . GrindstoneEvent.OnTakeItem is fired when the output of a grindstone is taken. The event is called from GrindstoneMenu(int, Inventory) . If the event is canceled, vanilla behavior will not run, and no inputs will be consumed. If the amount of experience is larger than or equal to 0, the vanilla behavior for calculating experience will not be used.

methods.name: getNewTopItem
methods.description: Returns the item in that will be in the top input grindstone slot after the event..

methods.name: getNewBottomItem
methods.description: Returns the item in that will be in the bottom input grindstone slot after the event.

methods.name: setNewTopItem
methods.description: Sets the itemstack in the top slot.

methods.name: setNewBottomItem
methods.description: Sets the itemstack in the bottom slot.

methods.name: getXp
methods.description: Returns the experience amount given to the player, will be the value from vanilla calculations unless modified by the event.
